cs3500.music.view

Class AudioVisualView

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3500.music.view.AudioVisualView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView

    public class AudioVisualView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView
    An audiovisual view for a piece of music. The view contains both an audio view and a visual view. This 'wrapper' view keeps the two contained views in sync so that music is heard audibly at the same rate as it is played visually.
